column4: I am having problems with apt-get:  packages I know exist are not found: subversion for one
can you just pastebin the command you ran and the output.  Throw in sources.list too since you've got that handy now
run « sudo apt-get update » and try again
pastebin the output of « sudo apt-get update && sudo apt-get install subversion »
Linux lehi 2.6.31-14-generic #48-Ubuntu SMP Fri Oct 16 14:04:26 UTC 2009 i686 GNU/Linux
are you able to instal lother stuff?
switch to archive.ubuntu.com and see what happens
what's the quickest wayt to make theswitch?
use sed on your sources.list and run sudo apt-get update
probably some issue with the mirror
